title: Telecomm Font
content: Anyone have any good suggestions for a contemporary Sans Serif font for a telecom. Needs to have a full family of wieghts, condensed, etc, very flexible. I’ve looked at Interstate, its cool but It’s used by many in the category.
author: rickcornett

comments.content:
Rick

Have you concidered Sophisto? It’s a modern sans serif full of character and not overused (yet). Also it has a large range of weights, symbols and ornaments. You’ll find it here:

[http://www.macrhino.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20060504032646/http:/www.macrhino.com/)

Cheers

How about Corpid? [http://www.lucasfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060504032646/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/) There’s a new OT version

Si
